column1: I noted that the Institute submitted its strategic plan for the period 2021- 2025 to NPA for review and approval but at the time of audit the certificate of approval had not been received. Out of the budgeted NTR of UGX.0.67Bn for the year 2020/2021only UGX.0.073Bn was collected, representing a performance of 9% of the target.
